bibl.title: Coptic fragments from a Festal Letter of the Late Sixth Century (John Rylands Library, Coptic Suppl. N. 47-48): Damian or Eulogius?
bibl.note: P. Ryl. Copt. Suppl. Inv. N. 47-48 (= LDAB 108317).
bibl.seg: 141.13 P. Ryl. Copt. Suppl. Inv. N. 47-48
Alberto Camplani, Coptic fragments from a Festal Letter of the Late Sixth Century (John Rylandts Library, Coptic. Suppl. N. 47-48): Damian or Eulogius?

Mat Immerzeel & Jacques van der Vliet (edd.), with the assistance of Maarten Kersten & Carolien van Zoest, Coptic Studies on the Threshold of a New Millennium. Proceedings of the Seventh International Congress of Coptic Studies. Leiden, 27 August - 2 September 2000. I = Orientalia Lovaniensia Analecta. 133 (Leuven, 2004) pp. 317-327, 2 figg.
